snippet: Only 47 of 102 vehicles were rated Good or Acceptable by the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety, indicating flaws in the federally mandated Latch system.
lead_paragraph: Only 47 of 102 vehicles were rated Good or Acceptable by the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety, indicating flaws in the federally mandated Latch system.

headline.main: Few Vehicles Equipped for Easy Child Safety Seat Installation, Study Finds
